Our Tools

CC-SolBMCCyclo-SolSmart-MuVerfSol-SlicerCC-SolSymSol-RepairerVeriSol-MCE

Cyclometric Complexity Analysis for Solidity

Analyzes the cyclometric complexity of Solidity smart contracts to identify code quality issues and refactoring opportunities.

About Cyclo-Sol

We have developed another product, the Cyclomatic Complexity Analyser of Solidity Smart Contract (Cyclo-Sol). As a first step, we propose using Control Flow Graph to measure the Cyclomatic Complexity of smart contracts.

Supported Languages

Solidity

Analysis Methods

Static Analysis

Key Features

Cyclomatic complexity measurement
Code complexity scoring
Function-level analysis
Refactoring recommendations
Complexity trend tracking

Use Cases

Identify complex functions

Improve code maintainability

Guide refactoring efforts

Establish quality metrics
